value.title: Llama Guard is now available in Amazon SageMaker JumpStart
value.excerpt: Today we are excited to announce that the Llama Guard model is now available for customers using Amazon SageMaker JumpStart. value.title: Identify cybersecurity anomalies in your Amazon Security Lake data using Amazon SageMaker
value.excerpt: In this post, you learn how to prepare data sourced from Amazon Security Lake, and then train and deploy an ML model using an IP Insights algorithm in SageMaker. This model identifies anomalous network traffic or behavior which can then be composed as part of a larger end-to-end security solution.
